40 class AudioPlayer : public aace::core::PlatformInterface {
41 protected:
42  AudioPlayer() = default;
43 
44 public:
45  virtual ~AudioPlayer();
46 
50  enum class PlayerActivity {
51 
55  IDLE,
56 
60  PLAYING,
61 
65  STOPPED,
66 
70  PAUSED,
71 
75  BUFFER_UNDERRUN,
76 
80  FINISHED
81  };
82 
88  virtual void playerActivityChanged( PlayerActivity state ) {}
89 };
90 
91 inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& stream, const AudioPlayer::PlayerActivity& state) {
92  switch (state) {
93  case AudioPlayer::PlayerActivity::IDLE:
94  stream << "IDLE";
95  break;
96  case AudioPlayer::PlayerActivity::PLAYING:
97  stream << "PLAYING";
98  break;
99  case AudioPlayer::PlayerActivity::STOPPED:
100  stream << "STOPPED";
101  break;
102  case AudioPlayer::PlayerActivity::PAUSED:
103  stream << "PAUSED";
104  break;
105  case AudioPlayer::PlayerActivity::BUFFER_UNDERRUN:
106  stream << "BUFFER_UNDERRUN";
107  break;
108  case AudioPlayer::PlayerActivity::FINISHED:
109  stream << "FINISHED";
110  break;
111  }
112  return stream;
113 }
